name: Sneha Mehta
body:
### Welcome to my homepage!

I am a 1st year Graduate student in Computer Science at Virginia Tech.

My current work is at the intersection of computer vision, crowdsourcing and machine learning. In my research assistantship with Prof. Kurt Luther I am combining techniques in content-based image retrieval and crowdsourced human intelligence to make sense of visual data. One interesting outcome of this research is to be able to analyze and describe arbitrarily complex images (given little or no context) and be able to predict information about the image. ### Academics I hold a Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering and a Master's in Mathematics from BITS, Pilani, India. My brief resume can be downloaded here. For more information please follow this link ### Projects I am taking Computer Vision and Machine Learning courses this semesters. To follow some cool assignments I did for my classes go here ### Interests ### Contact facebook linkedin
